table.searchString: sourcetype="alaxala_auth_log" "*VLAN*" "*$string$*" | RENAME host AS SWITCH_NAME | RENAME ala_auth_type AS AUTH_TYPE | RENAME ala_auth_port AS PORT | RENAME ala_auth_vlan AS VLAN | RENAME ala_auth_msg AS MSG | RENAME ala_auth_msg_num AS MSG_NO | RENAME ala_auth_level AS LEVEL | table _time, MSG_NO, LEVEL, AUTH_TYPE, SWITCH_NAME, USER, IP, VLAN, MAC, PORT, MSG
table.title: AlaxalA Layer2 Authentication Log
